name: Pacman Animate
description: collect the dots by scoring points if you eat the power dots the ghost will turned blue if you catch the ghost when they were blue you got to eat them before its too late if get close to the ghost if its not blue you'll lose a live if you lose many lives by getting close to the ghost when its not blue its game over if you collect all the dots by scoring  100 you win but make sure you save your high score so you wont forget
